name: Code Moo
storyline: The burger chain Circus Burger plans to expand their enterprise over the Summer: that means more locations and more beef! Join Daisy, Carrots, and Sarge as they race to vandalize Circus Burger establishments and send an important message to would-be diners: EAT MOR CHIKIN!
summary: Code Moo is an official game for the Chick-fil-A brand that is available on the Chick-fil-A website and mobile app for a few weeks in the Summer each year. By playing the game each week, players can help the cows vandalize Circus Burger establishments and win vouchers for real world Chick-fil-A menu items.
